nodes.text: Ion Papanoida was a Pantoran male who lived during the Clone Wars. The son of Chairman Notluwiski Papanoida, Ion was brother to Chi Eekway Papanoida and Che Amanwe Papanoida.
Ion Papanoida is based on George Lucas' son, Jett Lucas. Ion was voiced by Seth Green, who had previously voiced Todo 360 in the series.
